Hello ğŸ‘‹ This is Vishal's bot. I'm here to automate the process of getting to know each other at scale!ğŸ¤– 

Looking at Instagram profiles or adding on Snapchat just doesn't cut it, you know?

So, to start with, please tell me your name

Here are a few things that I can help you with: 

Type 1 if you'd like a brief introduction on Vishal, his likes and dislikes, and all that ğŸ˜ƒğŸ¥·

Type 2 to take a fun little quiz to see how your answers would compare against Vishal's ğŸ¤”

Type 3 to get his social media handles if you'd like to chat with him ğŸ’¬

If you're stuck at any point, just type 'help'

Vishal is a 27 year old guy living in Northern California. He works as a Data Analyst ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» for a tech startup and likes to write poetry and make music in his free time ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ¨. Vishal's a vegetarian and a teetotaler since 2015. He's really into fitness ğŸ’ª and likes going on hikes every now and then ğŸƒ. He's really into (board) game nights as well ğŸ®! 

Type 'next' for more

History:
Vishal was born in a small town ğŸ›– of Gujarat in India. He went to a convent school ğŸ« until the 10th grade and then moved to the city of Ahmedabad for his 11th and 12th grade. 

Later, he got his Bachelors in Engineering from the city of Vasad, and a Masters from CSU Fullerton ğŸ“. 

Type 'next' for more

History continued:
Vishal believes that everybody is a work-in-progress being but also thinks that people seldom change, unless they really try to. 

He avoids sticking to a doctrine or a belief system, but likes to stay consistent about things he is sure of. 

His political views are mostly moderate ğŸ“‹ğŸ–‹, although he supports Bernie Sanders/Andrew Yang on many issues such as Healthcare and Universal Basic Income ğŸª™.

He's an INFP/INTP afterall ğŸ¥²

Hope this wasn't too bland of an introduction!

HELP
To reset this chat and return to the introduction, type 'Reset' or 'Start over'
To repeat the last message/question, type 'Repeat' or 'huh?' or 'say that again'. To give feedback, type your message starting with the word 'feedback'
To read the next message, type 'next' or 'tell me more'
That's all I had to share!
Goodbye
Thanks, I've stored your feedback
Awesome, I'll call you
Okay, I have changed your name to
I'm sorry, I don't recognize the input. Type "help" if you're stuck
I didn't understand that. Type "help" if you're stuck
I don't quite follow. Type "help" if you're stuck
I'm not an AI bot, so I don't understand. Type "help" if you're stuck
I don't know how to answer that. Type "help" if you're stuck
Could you try saying something different? Type "help" if you're stuck
Quiz coming soon!

Let's play a quick 5-question game for you to decide if both of you will vibe well ğŸŒ»âœ¨ğŸŒ™! 

I will reveal Vishal's answers after reading your answers. 

To stop at any point, reply 'exit'. To repeat the question, type 'repeat'. To get help, type 'help'. Ready? 

1. What's your favorite movie in the comedy genre?

Nice! Vishal's favorite comedy movie is Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan. Lol.

2. Do you have any pet peeves? ğŸ¶

Uh oh, that sounds harsh. Vishal's top pet peeve is people driving recklessly. However, he has never instigated a road rage ğŸ˜œ

3. Which fictional character do you relate to the most? ğŸ¦¸

Interesting indeed. One character that Vishal has related with the most during as a teen is Dr. House from House M.D.

4. Is there anything that you don't eat? ğŸ”

Hmm, interesting dietary choices. Vishal doesn't eat meat and loves bitter gourd. Strange.ğŸ¥´

5. Okay, last question! What's the best present you ever gave someone or received? ğŸ

Presents are wonderful. The best present Vishal ever gave was a taser gun and ever received was a custom-made notebook with a marvelous painting on the front ğŸ“š

That's all! Feel free to hit him up if you think you two will vibe well ğŸ“± @vishalvatnani

Here's Vishal's Instagram: @vishalvatnani.

Thanks for using the bot!
